PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_RoofCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcRoof. Note: Properties for ProjectedArea and TotalArea added in IFC 2x3

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1')

PropertyDef.Name: FireRating
PropertyDef.Definition: Fire rating for this object. It is given according to the national fire safety classification.

PropertyDef.Name: IsExternal
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external element and faces the outside of the building.

PropertyDef.Name: ProjectedArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Area of the roof projected onto a 2D horizontal plane

PropertyDef.Name: TotalArea
PropertyDef.Definition: Total exposed area of the roof
